t: Moody Blues - This Is the Moody Blues - 2 Record Set - (12" 33 rpm Vinyl Record) - Amazon.com Music
MOODY BLUES - this is the moody blues - Amazon.com Music
s: I think that "This Is The Moody Blues" should be re-released in an updated format. It would be great if the CD's were packaged with the see-through jewel cases, featuring the "Classic 7" album covers underneath (As seen with the 1997 re-mastered CD releases of those albums). The CD booklet should remain the same, because it includes a lot of info on the band, plus a mini poster of the photo montage from the vinyl ...

t: MOODY BLUES - Days of Future Passed [Vinyl] - Amazon.com Music
s: Whether you are a passing fan or a die-hard fan, "The Days Of Future Passed" was one of the best experiments in music that was ever tried. The good news is, it passed the test. This Moody Blues classic started a trend that has spread to so many bands and music artists worldwide.

t: MOODY BLUES - Collection - Amazon.com Music
s: In October 1998, Polydor/Threshold released The Moody Blues Anthology in the US and as The Collection in 2001 the UK on Universal/Decca/Threshold. In 2005, Universal reissued Anthology as part of their Gold series with new mastering, different cover and a slightly different song list.
